columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

merged.name: OCCURRENCE_CODES
merged.description: The EPISODE table contains high-level information on the episodes recorded in clinical system for your patients. When a provider sees a patient several times for an ongoing condition, such as prenatal care, these encounters can be linked to a single Episode of Care.

merged.name: CATARACT_PLANNING_INFO
merged.description: This table contains cataract surgery information about the status of the surgery.

merged.name: CATARACT_PLANNING_GOALS
merged.description: This table contains information about the goals for cataract surgery.

merged.name: RAD_THERAPY_EPISODE_INFO
merged.description: This table stores information related to a radiation-therapy episode, such as the goal and treatment technique. This is a no-add table.
